rows.label: xs00010100_MSG0002
rows.name:
The Earth was caught in a great battle
between unknown alien forces.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs00010100_MSG0003
rows.name:
Their weapons were terrifying and powerful
beyond human reckoning.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs00010100_MSG0004
rows.name:
Our planet was overwhelmed—its surface reduced
to ash and rubble in the blink of an eye.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs00010100_MSG0005
rows.name:
The Coalition government knew the war was coming;[ST:page p1=112 ]in response, they prepared the
Earthlife Colonization Project—Project Exodus.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs00010100_MSG0006
rows.name:
Interstellar arks were launched all across the planet—
from every major city on Earth.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs00010100_MSG0007
rows.name:
Bravely, we leapt from our cradle—our home
for the last four and a half billion years.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs00010100_MSG0008
rows.name:
But...most of the arks never even made it out of
the atmosphere. Only a small handful managed to escape.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs00010100_MSG0009
rows.name: Among them was our ship, the White Whale.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs00010100_MSG0010
rows.name:
After leaving Earth behind,
we spent two years wandering in space, searching...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs00010100_MSG0011
rows.name:
We thought of ourselves as the lucky ones—
the pioneers who would settle a new world.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs00010100_MSG0012
rows.name: But our past caught up with us. Literally.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs00010100_MSG0013
rows.name:
The alien blitz was unrelenting. If not for the efforts
of a lone hero, we would never have survived.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs00010100_MSG0014
rows.name: Our ship took heavy damage—we lost control.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs00010100_MSG0015
rows.name:
With our flight systems down, the White Whale
was pulled into the gravitational field of a nearby planet,[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs00010100_MSG0016
rows.name:
its hull shattering and breaking to pieces
as we plummeted toward the surface...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs00010100_MSG0017
rows.name: Since then, two months have passed.[ST:wait ]
